name: AssemblyAITranscriberRecord
description: This component processes and convert audio and video files to text using AssemblyAI API (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

code.value:
from axiestudio import CustomComponent
from axiestudio.field_typing import Data
from axiestudio.schema import Record

from axiestudio import CustomComponent
import subprocess
import sys
import base64
from tempfile import NamedTemporaryFile

def install(package):
    subprocess.check_call([sys.executable, "-m", "pip", "install", package])
    return 1

install("assemblyai")

class AssemblyAITranscriberRecord (CustomComponent):
    display_name = "AssemblyAITranscriberRecord "
    description = "This component processes and convert audio and video files to text using AssemblyAI API"
    import assemblyai as aai
    
    def build_config(self):
        return {
            'audio_file': {
                "display_name": "AudioRecord",
                'required': True
            },
            "language": {
                "display_name": "language",
                "advanced": False,
                "required": True,
                "options": [
                    "Global English",
                    "Australian English",
                    "British English",
                    "US English",
                    "Spanish",
                    "French",
                    "German",
                    "Italian",
                    "Portuguese",
                    "Dutch",
                    "Hindi",
                    "Japanese",
                    "Chinese",
                    "Finnish",
                    "Korean",
                    "Polish",
                    "Russian",
                    "Turkish",
                    "Ukrainian",
                    "Vietnamese",
                ],
            },
            "AssemblyAIKey":{
                "password": True
            }
        }
    
    def build(self, file: Record, AssemblyAIKey: str, language: str) -> str:
        def get_language_code(language):
            language_dict = {
                "Global English": "en",
                "Australian English": "en_au",
                "British English": "en_uk",
                "US English": "en_us",
                "Spanish": "es",
                "French": "fr",
                "German": "de",
                "Italian": "it",
                "Portuguese": "pt",
                "Dutch": "nl",
                "Hindi": "hi",
                "Japanese": "ja",
                "Chinese": "zh",
                "Finnish": "fi",
                "Korean": "ko",
                "Polish": "pl",
                "Russian": "ru",
                "Turkish": "tr",
                "Ukrainian": "uk",
                "Vietnamese": "vi",
            }
            return language_dict.get(language, "Unknown language")
        import assemblyai as aai
        aai.settings.api_key = AssemblyAIKey
        language = get_language_code(language)
        config = aai.TranscriptionConfig(language_code=language, speaker_labels=True)
        transcriber = aai.Transcriber(config=config)
    
        transcript = transcriber.transcribe(str(file.data["file_path"]))
        if(str(transcript.text) == 'None'):
            return "No text was detected."
        return str(transcript.text)
code.name: code

node.description: This component processes and convert audio and video files to text using AssemblyAI API

data.description: This component processes and convert audio and video files to text using AssemblyAI API

import sys
import base64
from tempfile import NamedTemporaryFile
